summary: wifi: mac80211: fix general-protection-fault in ieee80211_subif_start_xmit()
details:
wifi: mac80211: fix general-protection-fault in ieee80211_subif_start_xmit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.9 by commit 03eb68c72cee249aeb7af7d04a83c033aca3d6d9, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit f856373e2f31ffd340e47e2b00027bd4070f74b3. For more details please see the references link.
